CatDescriptText: Related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 11, 1962, pg. 11, reads: "D.I.'s Aid - These three glamorous members of the D.I. Club take time out for lunch with Charles (Buggsy) Drafts, the 15-year-old quadriplegic who will be one of the beneficiaries of their "Pearl Bailey Revue" this Sunday night at the Holiday House. Left to right [right to left]: "Buggsy," Gloria Grate, Margaret West Watson, D.I. president, and Nellye Baron. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: D. I. Club members Nellye Baron, Margaret West Watson, and Gloria Golden Grate, having lunch with Charles "Buggsy" Drafts, in domestic kitchen interior
